name: ScheduledAction
description: Creates a scheduled scaling action for an Auto Scaling group, changing the number of servers available for your application in response to predictable load changes.

properties.name: AutoScalingGroupName
properties.description: The name or ARN of the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: DesiredCapacity
properties.description: The number of Amazon EC2 instances that should be running in the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: EndTime
properties.description: The time in UTC for this schedule to end. For example, 2010-06-01T00:00:00Z.

properties.name: MaxSize
properties.description: The maximum number of Amazon EC2 instances in the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: MinSize
properties.description: The minimum number of Amazon EC2 instances in the Auto Scaling group.

properties.name: Recurrence
properties.description: The time in UTC when recurring future actions will start. You specify the start time by following the Unix cron syntax format. For more information about cron syntax, go to http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cron.

properties.name: StartTime
properties.description: The time in UTC for this schedule to start. For example, 2010-06-01T00:00:00Z.
